functional_aspects.name: Steel Melting System
functional_aspects.description: Controls and monitors steel melting processes.

children.name: Temperature Control
children.description: Regulates furnace temperature for optimal steel melting.

children.name: Chemical Composition Monitoring
children.description: Analyzes chemical properties to ensure quality.

children.name: Slag Management
children.description: Controls the removal and handling of slag byproducts.

functional_aspects.name: Steel Casting System
functional_aspects.description: Manages the casting of molten steel into molds.

functional_aspects.name: Heat Treatment System
functional_aspects.description: Controls the heating and cooling of steel to alter its properties.

functional_aspects.name: Steel Recycling Unit
functional_aspects.description: Handles the reprocessing and reuse of steel materials.

functional_aspects.name: Surface Treatment System
functional_aspects.description: Applies coatings and finishes to steel surfaces.

functional_aspects.name: Gas Control System
functional_aspects.description: Regulates gas flow for steel production processes.

product_aspects.name: Induction Furnace
product_aspects.description: A furnace used for steel melting via induction heating.

children.name: Power Supply Unit
children.description: Provides electrical power for induction heating.

product_aspects.name: Continuous Casting Machine
product_aspects.description: Forms steel into semi-finished shapes continuously.

product_aspects.name: Annealing Furnace
product_aspects.description: Heats steel to remove internal stresses.

product_aspects.name: Scrap Shredder
product_aspects.description: Shreds scrap steel into smaller pieces for recycling.

product_aspects.name: Electrostatic Coating System
product_aspects.description: Applies coatings to steel surfaces using electrostatic charge.

product_aspects.name: Gas Flow Regulator
product_aspects.description: Controls the distribution of gases in steel production.

location_aspects.name: Furnace Area
location_aspects.description: Location where the steel melting furnace is installed.

location_aspects.name: Cooling Zone
location_aspects.description: Location dedicated to cooling and solidification processes.

location_aspects.name: Casting Zone
location_aspects.description: Dedicated area for steel casting operations.

location_aspects.name: Heat Treatment Section
location_aspects.description: Facility for controlled heating and cooling processes.

location_aspects.name: Recycling Yard
location_aspects.description: Area designated for steel recycling operations.

location_aspects.name: Surface Treatment Hall
location_aspects.description: Space for applying protective coatings and finishes.

location_aspects.name: Gas Supply Station
location_aspects.description: Facility for managing industrial gas distribution.
